又 youd 𐎊𐎄 יָד < 𒋗 qātu кедь kedʹ Hand:Kante Quaddel ;)

  1. yet again
  2. (right) hand 右 YAD™ يد yadd ϫⲓϫ/ⲧⲟⲧ judge ϭⲓϫ 🖑 YUD™

有 yǒu: “hand” : have (at hand)
友 yǒu: “hand” : assistent ⇨ friend
夭 yāo: “hand“ : gentle

又 YAD 𓂞 ⋍ 及 jí (𓂋𓂝 reach)

ﾇヌㄡ攵攵ㄆ夊文 厂 hàn hang Hände ⇔ Wende 反

Zwei Hände ZwoHand = shuāng 双 > 𒋗 ŠU 手 shǒu shoulder / hand / arm

汉 hàn ⇔ Hand
汉 kàn ⇔ Hand:Kante > 𒋗 qātu > 𐎊𐎄 יָד > 又 you
